version_description:
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

iOS 13 compatibility.

You should try Triplens also in Dark Mode :)

And in this release, we fixed bugs and made performance improvements to provide you the best Triplens experience.

Thank you for using Triplens! With this new version:

-3D Touch is now available.
-We’ve made some performance improvements and minor bug fixes to provide you with a better experience.
We keep updating our app with minor bug fixes and performance improvements to provide you with the best experience!

Thank you for using Triplens!

We’ve made some performance improvements and minor bug fixes to provide you with a better experience.

Happy New Year!

Thank you for using Triplens. See what’s new:

- Add to Favorites: You are now able to add the translation of an image or text which you have taken a photo of to your favorites. Tap on the star icon on the result page, name the translation and save it. That’s all! You can easily access it at any time.

- We've made some performance improvements and minor bug fixes provide you with a better experience.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
